title: About us
body: The Soll Initiative Project is a broader effort focused on addressing financial challenges in underserved communities through thoughtful, community-centered solutions. While technology can sometimes create distance, the Initiative emphasizes tools that strengthen trust, preserve collective practices, and foster long-term opportunity. Soll is the first and flagship platform developed under this Initiative, modernizing the long-standing tradition of rotational savings in a secure and reliable way. If you would like to learn more or connect with us, we invite you to reach out using the contact form.

members.name: Handerson Coq
members.description: Handerson, a dedicated software engineer and entrepreneur, excels in developing community-oriented applications. He is passionate about creating digital solutions that enhance community engagement and drive societal progress.
